plurals.name: fast_connect_headset_reset
plurals.item: Press and hold the button on the case for %1$d seconds
Press and hold the button on the case for %1$d second

plurals.name: fast_connect_reset_air2_se
plurals.item: Press and hold any touch sensitive area on the earphones for %1$d seconds
Press and hold any touch sensitive area on the earphones for %1$d second

plurals.name: fast_connect_reset_common_seconds
plurals.item: Press and hold for %1$d secs to reset
Press and hold for %1$d sec to reset

plurals.name: fast_connect_reset_nzbt
plurals.item: Press and hold the button for %1$s secs when the device is off
Press and hold the button for %1$s sec when the device is off
